decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information  to satisfy the requirements of Condition 15 (SUDs) of planning permission 22/00574/FUL. The applicant has not demonstrated the provision of a satisfactory means of surface water disposal incorporated into the design and the build of the proposed development and therefore fails to prevent the increased risk of flooding, in accordance with policy SI.13 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012
description: Details required for Condition 15 (SUDs) of planning permission 22/00574/FUL (Demolition of existing block of 5no.x garages and erection of a new 3 bed 5 person detached dwelling with associated amenity space, parking, cycle and refuse storage.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
